name: Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer数据伪造问题漏洞
product: ["Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer <=7.4.2", "Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer <=7.2.9", "Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer 7.0"]
description: Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer是美国飞塔（Fortinet）公司的一款客户端安装程序。Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer存在数据伪造问题漏洞，该漏洞源于加密签名验证不当，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致本地用户权限提升。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://fortiguard.fortinet.com/psirt/FG-IR-25-126
patch: Fortinet FortiClient MacOS installer数据伪造问题漏洞的补丁
